page.title: 06The Shops
page.content: {The Post Office In the 1930's the Post Office was small. A few years later it was turned into a grocers. In 1981 an extension was built. An Off Licence was started 6 years ago. The owners don't think that they have much competition with the other shops and think it is very well situated. It is very popular and gets the odd awkward customer. {The Paper Shop The paper shop has had its new owners since the second of November 1984. It used to be owned by Mr and Mrs Lynn (junior). The shop started where the present day St Pauls stands then, it was closed down and moved to where the chip shop stands. Later it was moved to where the it is now. The shop is about 50 years opd and gets the odd awkward customer. It is very popular and id well situated.
